title: Create navbar
description: Create navbar with two sections. First section is the logo and must be of specific width. Second section contains a title which indicates the current page and an "Add Task" button.

title: Create sidebar
description: Create sidebar, it must have two sections, first is the navigation, which are dynamic, and the second section controls the sidebar toggling and the overall theme (light/dark).

title: Create re-usable components
description: Create the components that will be re-used in different places on the page.

subtasks.value: Create darkmode for each of these components

title: Change navigation to be dynamic
description: The sidebar navigation must be dynamic, depending on what the user creates.

subtasks.value: Create json data (for now), like cards have
Implement routing and change navbar title to contain the current page
